OrgName: St. Jude Medical, Inc. and Pacesetter, Inc. for Merlin.NetTM Patient Care Network
activities: St. Jude Medical, Inc., and its US divisions Pacesetter, Inc. and CardioMEMS, LLC processes the personal data of patients and customers enrolled in the Merlin.NetTM Patient Care Network and CardioMEMSTM Heart Failure Monitoring System at the direction of the hospitals and clinics acting as data controllers located in the European Economic Area and Switzerland. The Merlin.NetTM Patient Care Network and CardioMEMSTM Heart Failure Monitoring System are centralized databases operated by St. Jude Medical, Inc., Pacesetter, Inc. and CardioMEMS, LLC to support patient care.
corpofftitle1: VP, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Merlin.NetTM Patient Care Network and CardioMEMS Heart Failure Monitoring System data for patients and customers
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
